content: materials - main color mc 1 of purl soho s cotton pure on a cone 1 100% organically grown cotton each skein is approximately 2789 yards/ 1000g approximately 2620 yards required we used the color birch bark - contrast color cc 1 skein of purl soho s cotton pure 2 100% organically grown cotton each skein is 279 yards/ 100g approximately 140 yards required we used egret white - a size g 4 5mm crochet hook 3 note prefer working from skeins you ll need 10 of cotton pure for the main color gauge - 6 double_crochet bundles 3 double_crochet per bundle including 6 spaces = 4 inches - 11 row of double crochets = 4 inches size 50-inches x 56-inches wide note an earlier version 4 of this pattern used 11 skeins of madelinetosh tosh merino light you ll need 10 skeins of the main color 1 skein of the contrast color and a size c 2 75-3mm crochet hook to make this version we used the colors antler for mc and edison bulb for cc for more including gauge and size click here 5 1 https //www purlsoho com/cotton-pure-cones html 2 https //www purlsoho com/cotton-pure html 3 https //www purlsoho com/tools/crochet-hooks html 4 https //www purlsoho com/create/2011/04/16/elegant-granny-style-the-granny-stripe-blanket/ 5 https //www purlsoho com/create/2011/04/16/elegant-granny-style-the-granny-stripe-blanket/
